languages.text: "Искренне надеюсь, что влияние Имматериума еще не успело затронуть ваши тело и душу. Если позволите, я не советую вам оставаться на станции — возвращайтесь на свой пустотный корабль. А я обязан спасти леди Кассию. Если не готовы помогать, рискуя жизнью — уходите. Немедля".

traits.locale_text: "Искренне надеюсь, что влияние Имматериума еще не успело затронуть и ваши тело и душу. Если позволите, я не советую вам оставаться на станции — возвращайтесь на свой корабль, под защиту поля Геллера. А я обязан спасти леди Кассию. Если не готовы помогать, рискуя жизнью — уходите. Немедля".

languages.text: "I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."
languages.original_text: "Искренне надеюсь, что влияние Имматериума еще не успело затронуть ваши тело и душу. Если позволите, я не советую вам оставаться на станции — возвращайтесь на свой пустотный корабль. А я обязан спасти леди Кассию. Если не готовы помогать, рискуя жизнью — уходите. Немедля".

traits.locale_text: "I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With your permission, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship, but I will save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

"I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With your permission, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship, but I will save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

"I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

"I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

"I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

"I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

languages.text: «Honestamente, espero que la influencia del Inmaterio aún no haya afectado tanto su cuerpo como su alma. Con el debido respeto, le aconsejo que no permanezca más tiempo en la estación. Regrese a su nave del vacío. Debo salvar a Lady Cassia. Si no está dispuest{mf|o|a} a ayudarme o arriesgar su vida, debería marcharse».
languages.original_text: "I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

traits.locale_text: «Honestamente, espero que la influencia del Inmaterio aún no haya afectado tanto su cuerpo como su alma. Con el debido respeto, le aconsejo que no permanezca más tiempo en la estación. Regrese a su nave del vacío. Debo salvar a Lady Cassia. Si no está dispuest{mf|o|a} a ayudarme o arriesgar su vida, debería marcharse».

languages.text: "Ich hoffe aufrichtig, dass der Einfluss des Immateriums sich noch nicht auf Euren Körper und Eure Seele ausgewirkt hat. Bei allem Respekt, ich rate Euch, nicht auf der Station zu bleiben. Kehrt auf Euer Raumschiff zurück. Ich muss Lady Cassia retten. Wenn Ihr nicht bereit seid, zu helfen oder Euer Leben zu riskieren, müsst Ihr jetzt gehen."
languages.original_text: "I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe aufrichtig, dass der Einfluss des Immateriums sich noch nicht auf Euren Körper und Eure Seele ausgewirkt hat. Bei allem Respekt, ich rate Euch, nicht auf der Station zu bleiben. Kehrt auf Euer Raumschiff zurück. Ich muss Lady Cassia retten. Wenn Ihr nicht bereit seid, zu helfen oder Euer Leben zu riskieren, müsst Ihr jetzt gehen."

languages.text: « J'espère sincèrement que l'influence de l'Immaterium n'a pas encore affecté votre corps ou votre âme. Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, je vous déconseille de rester dans la station. Retournez à votre vaisseau. Je dois sauver dame Cassia. Si vous ne souhaitez pas nous apporter votre aide ou risquer votre vie, je vous demanderai de partir. »
languages.original_text: "I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère sincèrement que l'influence de l'Immaterium n'a pas encore affecté votre corps ou votre âme. Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, je vous déconseille de rester dans la station. Retournez à votre vaisseau. Je dois sauver dame Cassia. Si vous ne souhaitez pas nous apporter votre aide ou risquer votre vie, je vous demanderai de partir. »

languages.text: “我衷心希望亚空间的影响尚未波及您的身体与灵魂。恕我直言，我建议您不要继续留在这座星站，快回到您的虚空舰上吧。至于我，我还要去救卡西娅女士。如果您不打算帮忙，或者您觉得这么做太冒险的话，您必须马上离开。”
languages.original_text: "I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

traits.locale_text: “我衷心希望亚空间的影响尚未波及您的身体与灵魂。恕我直言，我建议您不要继续留在这座星站，快回到您的虚空舰上吧。至于我，我还要去救卡西娅女士。如果您不打算帮忙，或者您觉得这么做太冒险的话，您必须马上离开。”

languages.text: 「非物質世界の影響が、あなたの体と魂にまだ及んでいないことを心から願うよ。失礼だが、助言するなら今すぐステーションから出ていくことだ。ヴォイドシップに戻るんだ。私はカシア様をお助けせねば。私に手を貸すか、自らの命を危険にさらすという気がないなら、今すぐ立ち去るがいい」
languages.original_text: "I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

traits.locale_text: 「非物質世界の影響が、あなたの体と魂にまだ影響を与えていないことを心から願うよ。失礼だが、助言するならこれ以上長くステーションにいてはいけない。ヴォイドシップに戻るんだ。私はカシア様をお助けせねば。自ら手を貸したり、命を危険にさらすという気がないなら、今すぐ立ち去るがいい」
「非物質世界の影響が、あなたの体と魂にまだ及んでいないことを心から願うよ。失礼だが、助言するなら今すぐステーションから出ていくことだ。ヴォイドシップに戻るんだ。私はカシア様をお助けせねば。私に手を貸すか、自らの命を危険にさらすという気がないなら、今すぐ立ち去るがいい」

languages.text: "Tüm içtenliğimle umuyorum ki Tindiyar, henüz bedenine veya ruhuna nüfuz etmemiştir. Saygısızlık olarak atfetme ancak bu istasyonu terk etmeni önereceğim. Derhâl uçsuz gemine dön. Leydi Cassia'yı kurtarmam lazım. Yardım etmeye yahut canını riske atmaya niyetin yoksa hemen burayı terk etmelisin."
languages.original_text: "I sincerely hope the influence of the Immaterium has not yet affected your body and your soul. With all due respect, I advise you not to remain at the station. Return to your voidship. I need to save Lady Cassia. If you are not willing to help or indeed risk your life, you must leave now."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm içtenliğimle umuyorum ki Tindiyar, henüz bedenine veya ruhuna nüfuz etmemiştir. Saygısızlık olarak atfetme ancak bu istasyonu terk etmeni önereceğim. Derhâl uçsuz gemine dön. Leydi Cassia'yı kurtarmam lazım. Yardım etmeye yahut canını riske atmaya niyetin yoksa hemen burayı terk etmelisin."
